attributes.additional_details: Children are being adversely affected educationally and socially, whilst teachers and parents face different challenges. Teachers are dealing with technology issues of children and systems on a daily basis which is not their core skill which adds to their workload and reduces learning time. Furthermore, parents are managing stressful working situations whilst attempting to support their children with home learning.
attributes.background: All children need to go back to school not only for an educational point of view but also for their mental well-being. Anxiety in children is growing due the significant change in their routine and the lack of contact with their friends.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Keep schools open - Give us our right to full time education back
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552187

Keep all schools and colleges open in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050

Have schools reopen after February half term, in England, as promised.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572322

Open primary schools for all children in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565613
